question:
You recently celebrated a special occasion in your personal life and received a card and a present from your colleagues at work. Write a letter to your colleagues.



In your letter:


remind your colleagues what the special occasion you were celebrating was
thank them for the card and gift
explain why you like the gift and how you will use it
text: I am writing this letter to thank you for the awesome present and the best wishes that you sent me.

As you all know, I have been promoted recently to the new position of "Manager Operations" on behalf of my performance and to make this a memorable day, I was having a party last week. However, I am very obliged to all of you to become a part of my celebration and bestowed me with a fascinating gift of a mobile phone along with a colourful card.

My phone is about to die and I have been thinking to replace it for a long time but you guys brought me a new cellular phone which is surely going to be very helpful for me. Since the position of Manager is the critical one, as it requires a lot of responsibilities to be handled, demands reporting on a regular basis to the higher-ups and replying to emails on time. All these tasks would become quite handy to do with this device. I will keep it to myself all the time rather than a laptop because it is small in size, easy to fit in my pocket, has a long battery life and has an additional feature of built-in emails.
I am very grateful for this note-worthy gift for this special moment.
